wikitext.*:
A '''prologue''' is an opening to a story that establishes the setting and gives background details and other miscellaneous information. Here, it can refer to:

==Books==
* '''[[Prologue (The Lord of the Rings)|Prologue Concerning Hobbits, and Other Matters]]''', the prologue to the ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
* "'''[[The Prologue]]'''", the first chapter of ''[[The Peoples of Middle-earth]]'', discussing the early drafts and composition of the abovementioned Prologue.

==Adaptations==
* ''[[Prologue: A Ring's Tale]]'', the second scene of [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]].
* ''[[Prologue: One Ring to Rule Them All...]]'', the first scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' ([[2001]]).
** ''[[Prologue: One Ring to Rule Them All]]'', the first song from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]''.
* "Prologue", the first quest line in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'' ([[2007]]).
{{disambig}}
